title: Redownload League
body: I deleted League of Legends earlier this week because the server was giving me issues. I was disconnecting from every game I played even though my internet was good and my ping never went above 100. I tried to redownload it today in hopes that deleting it would fix the problem and every time I try to open it I receive a message that says that the patcher kernel has stopped working. How can I fix this?

replies.body: Those patcher kernel errors almost always point to some type of permissions issue with your OS. Check out this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for some quick and easy steps to get that fixed up.
